books.description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent. Read by the author. 19 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BECOMING

books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university. Read by Julia Whelan. 12 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EDUCATED

books.author: Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show." Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BORN A CRIME

books.contributor: by Paul Holes, Jim Clemente and Peter McDonnell
books.description: A conversation about the story behind the investigation of the Golden State Killer. Read by Paul Holes and Jim Clemente. 6 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EVIL HAS A NAME

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SAPIENS

books.author: Charles Duhigg
books.description: An examination of the science behind habits. Read by Mike Chamberlain. 10 hours, 57 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE POWER OF HABIT

books.author: Howard Zinn
books.description: An account from the point of view of women, African-Americans and others who are often marginalized. Read by Jeff Zinn. 34 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A PEOPLE'S HISTORY OF THE UNITED STATES: 1492 TO PRESENT

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Former Navy SEALs explain some opposing forces in leading others. Read by the authors. 10 hours, 34 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE DICHOTOMY OF LEADERSHIP

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: Technological, political and social issues in the modern era. Read by Derek Perkins. 11 hours, 41 minutes unabridged.
books.title: 21 LESSONS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY

books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.description: When we can and cannot trust our intuitions in making business and personal decisions. 20 hours, 2 minutes unabridged. Read by Patrick Egan.
books.title: THINKING, FAST AND SLOW

books.author: Bob Woodward
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist describes debates and decision-making within the Trump White House. Read by Robert Petkoff. 12 hours, 20 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FEAR

books.author: Michael Diamond and Adam Horovitz
books.contributor: by Michael Diamond and Adam Horovitz
books.description: The story of the New York band who achieved hip hop stardom. Read by the authors and others. 12 hours, 41 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BEASTIE BOYS BOOK

books.author: Tucker Carlson
books.description: The Fox News anchor argues that America’s ruling class is out of touch with everyday citizens. Read by the author. 6 hours, 32 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SHIP OF FOOLS

books.author: Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese during World War II. Read by Edward Herrmann. 13 hours, 56 minutes unabridged.
